萪字的基本解释

萪
kē
一种生长在海边的藤本植物。
海葱，一种草。

萪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kē］
［《廣韻》苦禾切，平戈，溪。］
植物名。即藤心。

萪字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1042第28
【唐韻】苦禾切，音科。【集韻】草名。海蔥也。　又藤類。【玉篇】萪藤，出海邊。【齊民要術】萪藤，圍數寸，重于竹，可以杖蔑以縛船，及以爲席勝竹也。又柔萪藤有子，極酢爲菜滑，無物能比。○按《正字通》云：藤屬無萪，想未考《玉篇》諸書也。

萪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
萪字的起名意思

暂无。

萪
Basic explanation of words
萪
kē
A vine that grows by the sea.
Squill, a kind of grass.
萪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kē］
["Guang Yun" bitter he cut, Ping Ge, Xi. ]
Botanical name. That is the heart of the rattan.
萪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　萪; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1042 28
[Tang Yun] bitter grass cut, sound. 【Jiyun】Cross name. Squill also.　And rattan. [Jade articles] Vine, out to the sea. [Qi Min Yao Shu] The vine, several inches in circumference, heavier than bamboo, can be stalked to tie the boat, and it is thought that Xi Sheng bamboo. The softwood vines have seeds, which are extremely smooth and incomparable. ○According to "Zhengzitong", it says: Vine belongs to Wuyu, so I didn't want to test the books of "Jade Pian".
